summary: To reach the sea, a soldier has to fight his way through zombie hordes as well attempt to help other survivors along the way.
cast: Robert Tweten|Iren Levy|John J. Welsh|Richard Tyson|Raven Lexy|Russell Piette|Christopher Kriesa|Dakota Allen|Jenny Allford|Jade Armenta|Taylor Arthus|Chelsea Bailey|Mathew A Bohlin|Ryan Crane|Robert S. Dixon|Elliot Evans|Isaac Evans|Michael Flanagan|Victoria Graham|Gerald Gross|Sheri Harrai|Lucas Jones|David A. Lockhart|Antonio Lodi|Ted Macklevski|Leia Perez|Jason Jay Prado|Kaula Reed|Marilyn Robrahn|Conner M Schell|Kaitlin A Schell|Toni Anne Schlapia|John Scuderi|Jaydon Smith|Nicole Srp|Sean Story|Alex Strait|Ben Van Sickle
title: The Dead the Damned and the Darkness
